title: Locked out of Key Fragments for almost a year
body: I've been locked out of key fragments for almost an entire year and no season rewards either...

replies.body: Hey, I looked into this for you and it looks like you still need to get your Honor level up a bit.  It's been a little less than a month, but your progress can slow down if you have games that are a little less than honorable.  I do see some games that could have gone better, but you can reach out to our PB team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like more context on those cases.  Otherwise, do your best to play as a stand up summoner and hang in there!
I was unable to get keyfragments for the entire season... how is that a little less than a month?

Bad wording on my part, I was looking at when you adjusted to level 0 and not level 1 as well which was around June.   To clear things up, you are right that you haven't been eligible for hextech items for a good while.  This will be the case until your account shows consistent sportsmanlike conduct.

Yall banned me for complaining about Foucauldian theory.. What exactly constitutes as sportsmanlike conduct? I get reported for just muting the toxic people (who have honorable flairs I might add) and not even saying sh!t! Guess that is unsportsmanlike because the honorable boarder said so..
